Get ESPN NBA player box scores

espn_nba_player_box.Rd

Get ESPN NBA player box scores

espn_nba_player_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples


 espn_nba_player_box(game_id = 401283399)

#>       athlete_display_name team_short_display_name min   fg  fg3  ft oreb dreb
